name: AES-NZ1005-STE-ITP-PMT-0024 - DCW Pipework Hydrostatic Pressure Test
template name: AES-NZ1005-STE-ITP-PMT-0024 - DCW Pipework Hydrostatic Pressure Test

name: MATERIAL COMPLIANCE
RDM & Consent Approval - CPB Hold Point
CRITERIA - RDM approval tracker Consent approval tracker
General - CPB Hold Point
CRITERIA - For all materials, a certificate of compliance shall be provided to the Client Rep. before the materials are incorporated into the works.
• Specifications & QA Documents Approved
• Drawings are confirmed
• Equipment fit for purpose
CONNECT PRESSURE PUMP TO DCW RING MAINS
Confirm Flushing & Disinfection of Pipework - CPB Hold Point
CRITERIA - 1. Air should be removed at each building prior to the DCW water supply water entry assembly to prevent debris from entering building.
2. Ensure system sterilization completed.
3. Ensure TNK filtration is cleaned/ inspected if not isolated from test.
4. Ensure all screens/ strainers are cleaned/ inspected if not isolated from test.
Accept delivery of pump to site
CRITERIA - 5. Check pump is rated for pressure test
6. Check all supplied attachments are correct and in good order
7. Check fluid levels & fill as necessary
Isolate: Mains water Storage Tanks
CRITERIA - 1. Check Mains water is isolated
2. Check Storage Tank is isolated
Connect pump to DWC ring mains
CRITERIA - Confirm connections are safe and correct
Connect calibrated gauges for pressure test
CRITERIA - Confirm position is correct, gauge is in good order for test & calibrated
HYDROSTATIC TEST
Fill DWC ring mains with domestic water
CRITERIA - Completely fill closed loop system with water releasing all air from the Taps at each Building
Gradually increase system pressure to 1550kPa
CRITERIA - Slowly raise system pressure to 1550kPa
• Checking for any signs of leaks or pressure drops
Stabilize 1550kPa pressure (START WITNESSED) - CPB/IR Hold Point
CRITERIA - Record START time & photograph gauge
• All relevant parties to witness starting pressure of 1550kPa
Hold 1550kPa pressure for 35min (END WITNESSED) - CPB/IR Hold Point
CRITERIA - Record FINISH time & photograph gauge
• All relevant parties to witness pressure of 1550kPa
Pressure released or reduced for next test
CRITERIA - Supervisor to ensure energy (pressure) is only stored while under test
Discharge pressure leave system in a safe state
CRITERIA - Discharge system pressure, ensure area is left in a safe state meeting site requirement
COMPLETION RECORDS
Testing Results - CPB/IR Hold Point
CRITERIA - All pipework pressure test reports shall be provided
